title: Cinematic Action Drums Rolls Crescendo
description: Cinematic Action Drums Rolls Crescendo are orchestral cinematic drums that are perfect for creating crescendos and accents in games, movie trailers, and for creating drum fills in music.
longDescription:
AUDIO DEMO

These drums deliver a powerful and dramatic sound that will instantly grab the listener's attention and add depth and tension to your project.

This pack contains 75 WAV files in 48 kHz/24 bit quality and includes three types of drum roll crescendos (from long to short) with 25 WAV files each: Full, Mid and Short.

Cinematic Action Drums Rolls Crescendo - Sound List
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 75

Number of Audio Cues: 75

Sample rate / bit rate: 48000 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
